sentences.en: After a temporary kitchen was built at the Center, I realized that the temporary canopy I had seen in my dream was the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 当小中心临时厨房搭建好之后,我才了解之前打坐体验中临时搭盖的篷架原来就是厨房重地。

sentences.en: If we could design a plant with an ideal canopy, what would it be like?
sentences.cn: 假如我们能够设计一种有理想冠层的植物, 它会像是什么样 呢 ?

sentences.en: Mutual protection against wind is distinctly recognizable at the crown canopy.
sentences.cn: 在林冠层可以清楚地看到互相保护免遭风害的作用.

sentences.en: Or he lay flat on his bed, staring up at the canopy above.
sentences.cn: 他有时候连书也不想看,直伸伸地躺在床上, 睁起眼睛望着帐顶出神.

sentences.en: Performing for the time in order to run the main canopy.
sentences.cn: 当时的演出形式以跑大棚为主.

sentences.en: The canopy walls are of double thickness.
The trees formed a canopy over the yard.
The trees formed such a dense canopy that all beneath was a deep carpet of pine needles.
sentences.cn: 这些树形成了浓密的冠盖，下面是一层厚厚的松针。

sentences.en: The trees formed such a dense canopy that all beneath was a deep carpet of pine-needles.
sentences.cn: 树冠浓密，覆盖着厚厚一层松针。

sentences.en: There was a lurid, gloomy canopy above ; the elm - trees drooped their heavy blackish green.
sentences.cn: 上面是一片苍白又阴郁的苍穹; 榆树枝叶郁郁苍苍地低垂下来.

sentences.en: There was a waterproof canopy over the platform.
They lay down under a canopy of stars.
sentences.cn: 他们躺在繁星点点的天幕下.

sentences.en: Vigorous young red elm trees thrust emerald - green crowns through a canopy of waist - high weeds.
sentences.cn: 生机盎然的小红榆树从齐腰高的杂草从中探出翠绿的花冠.

sentences.en: Where under the canopy did you come from?
Woodland forest cover of more than 90 % canopy density of 0.8.
sentences.cn: 林地森林覆盖率达90%以上,林冠郁闭度为0.8.

words.tran_cn: 用天篷遮盖；遮蔽（canopy的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 郁闭度；林冠密度；林冠郁闭度

trans.tran_cn: 天篷，华盖，[建] 顶篷，顶盖，苍穹，树荫
trans.tran_en: a cover made of cloth that is fixed above a bed, seat etc as a decoration or as a shelter
